## SQLDialect.booleanLiteral() method

Get SQL Boolean literal for the specified value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
booleanLiteral(val: boolean): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  val | <code>boolean</code> | Boolean value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

SQL value expression that represents the provided Boolean value.
